lines.i: This class contains attributes that gives context to the task. It links the task that you create to an order, for example follow up based upon lab result.

ol.li:
Contains zero or one [0..1] id with data type Id
This is an identifier for item that have been linked to this task.
Contains exactly one [1..1] description with data type String
